summary: The head of a famous artist with a sordid past is found in the catacombs in Paris. In his studio, Commissaire Rousseau and the young profiler Mariella De Luca discover a second decapitated ... See full summary »
cast: Patrick Chesnais|Camille Panonacle|Jane Birkin|Ludmila Mikaël|Ruth Vega Fernandez|Katy Amaizo|Michel Bompoil|Gaëlle Bona|Marie Collins|Jean-Pierre Cormarie|Kenny Douala|Jules Dousset|Valérie Flan|Éric Frey|Jean-Michel Fête|Marc Léonian|Bruno López|Yvonnick Muller|Serge Onteniente|Laurence Roy|Vincent Vermignon|Emmanuel Vieilly
title: Bleu catacombes
